column4: I am still having huge problems configuring Dialup on my father's laptop that I just installed 6.06 on. I am using wvdial, it connects to my isp, it tells me that pppd is on, and it has received local address and primary and secondary DNS addresses.. can anyone help?
Not an expert with dialup, but it seems that everything you need is up...
thats what I thought too, but no websites show up... and I have the modem monitor tool in the toolbar, it gives me 0:00 for time connected
Try typing "ifconfig -a" and seeing what comes up... Compare that with "ifconfig". Is the interface active?
